img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_24.jpg)
After expelling energy around him (also dealing a lot of damage) to dissuade any attacks you might be trying to land, he'll move forward with a quick 1-2 punch with alternating palm strikes, the second one dealing a massive amount of damage and projecting his strike with extended range. The rapidity of these attacks often ensures that if you try to dodge the first hit, you'll get slammed by the second, and even using Rock Solid will just send you toppling backward. In these instances, using Cloud Step or Immobilize can be beneficial to getting away from this move, but be ready for him to resume the attack after Immobilize ends.
img_below_text:
However, he can vary up his moves to keep you guessing. Sometimes after the aforementioned stance, he can also abandon his palm blast for a quick sliding spin kick, so keep an eye on his movements and don't get comfortable in predicting his movements.
![Wukong Brook 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Wukong_Brook_23.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 15 from the file 'Non-Able.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Brook 24.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ee/Wukong_Brook_24.jpg)
After expelling energy around him (also dealing a lot of damage) to dissuade any attacks you might be trying to land, he'll move forward with a quick 1-2 punch with alternating palm strikes, the second one dealing a massive amount of damage and projecting his strike with extended range. The rapidity of these attacks often ensures that if you try to dodge the first hit, you'll get slammed by the second, and even using Rock Solid will just send you toppling backward. In these instances, using Cloud Step or Immobilize can be beneficial to getting away from this move, but be ready for him to resume the attack after Immobilize ends."
            - Following Text: "However, he can vary up his moves to keep you guessing. Sometimes after the aforementioned stance, he can also abandon his palm blast for a quick sliding spin kick, so keep an eye on his movements and don't get comfortable in predicting his movements.
![Wukong Brook 23.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/42/Wukong_Brook_23.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a tense moment in a snowy landscape from the game "Black Myth: Wukong." The character Wukong is seen expelling energy in a defensive stance, preparing for a powerful palm strike attack. The preceding text explains the mechanics of Wukong's rapid 1-2 punch, emphasizing the difficulty in dodging his moves and suggesting strategies like Cloud Step or Immobilize to evade his attacks. The following text warns of Wukong's unpredictability, noting he might switch to a sliding spin kick. The image visually represents the intense combat scenario described, highlighting the player's need to anticipate and react to Wukong's varied attacks.
